participant_abstract.sent: In this meeting some good design decisions were made and some of the marketing suggestions were thrown to the wayside.
I presented the hottest trends which might not be too relevant to our production focus which looked at the available formats and manufacturing substances.
I presented the current fashion of fancy, spongy, fruit and veg looks.
The Project Manager kept the discussion to the main points which was useful as the two designers had a vast amount of information.
The User Designer presented several remotes that are currently available and suggested the most playful, simple design.
The Industrial Designer introduced the advantages and disadvantages of a selection of power types and casings.

participant_actions.sent: Product Manager: organize the next meeting.
Industrial and Design Engineers: create a playdoh prototype.

participant_decisions.sent: Plastic/rubber or a combination of both.

participant_problems.sent: The marketing suggestions were not very attainable with the manufacturing constraints.
